wikimediaeditortasks-desc: Task generation, storage, and API modules for microcontributions.
apihelp-query+wikimediaeditortaskscounts: Feature-specific editing statistics for the logged-in user.
Get task-specific counts and targets passed for the logged-in user.
apihelp-query+wikimediaeditortaskssugges: Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with descriptions in Italian but not Japanese (and linked articles on both the Italian and Japanese Wikipedias).
Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with linked Italian Wikipedia articles but missing descriptions in Italian, and use them as a generator.
Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with labels in Italian but not Japanese (and linked articles on both the Italian and Japanese Wikipedias).
Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with linked Italian Wikipedia articles but missing labels in Italian, and use them as a generator.
Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with labels (a.k.a. captions) in Italian but not Japanese (and linked articles on both the Italian and Japanese Wikipedias).
Get Wikidata entity IDs for items with linked Italian Wikipedia articles but missing labels (a.k.a. captions) in Italian, and use them as a generator.
For translation-type task suggestions, wiki language code for the language in which the content should exist for a given item.
Wiki language code for the language in which the content is missing for a given item.
Desired number of results. Note that fewer results may be returned, if fewer than the desired number are available.
